content: I'll ask her to meet up for a quick coffee before my shift and introduce her to the charity event. If she's interested, I can ask her if she'd like to volunteer with me, but I'll make sure to keep it casual and non-committal. By the way, I've been meaning to follow up with Sophia, a woman I met at a networking event a couple of weeks ago, to discuss a potential collaboration. Do you think it's a good idea to send her a follow-up email this week?
